title: Why does everyone go quiet when they hear Hollom singing in Master and Commander? - Quora

response.answer_text: Everyone goes quiet during his singing for two reasons: to publicly display contempt, disrespect and distance themselves from Hollom, a person they no longer “like” (as they blame him, not only for perceived “undue” punishments, but deaths by proxy) and for superstitious beliefs (he is killing the wind and is a “Jonah”) To sing with him would be to lump yourself in with all of that…so, no one does.
